step1.para: Chock wheels and open hood.
Disconnect battery.
Raise vehicle, support axle with stands.
Remove catwalk.
Remove rear section of engine cover in cab.
Remove front section of drive shaft.
Disconnect all air lines necessary to remove air tank assembly.
Remove air tanks with frame as an assembly.
Disconnect air lines and electrical connections necessary to remove transmission.
Remove shift tower from transmission and lay aside.
Disconnect clutch linkage from clutch arm.
Remove clutch inspection plate.
Remove all bolts except two (2) retaining transmission to engine, include fuel hose support bracket and exhaust pipe support bracket..
Secure all hoses/wiring/ lines out of way for access.
Secure transmission jack to transmission.
Remove bolts retaining transmission. Remove transmission from engine.

note.para: To remove transmission from under vehicle:

step1.para: Remove air dryer from frame. Reposition for access.
Remove transmission from vehicle.
To install transmission under vehicle, push transmission under vehicle, and install air dryer.
Install transmission and retaining bolts.
Remove transmission jack.
Install fuel hose and exhaust support bracket.
Install clutch linkage and inspection plate.
Connect air lines and electrical connections to transmission.
Install shift tower. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air tanks with frame assembly.
Install air lines to air tanks.
Install front drive shaft. Torque bolts to spec.
Install catwalk.
Install engine cover.
Lower vehicle.
Connect battery.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
